title: Interpretation of a dream about short hair by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about short hair by Ibn SirinInterpretation of dreams Short hair in a dream It indicates many things that vary between good and evil. If the hair is short, this is an indication that you will hear sad news and suffer from extreme fatigue and hardship. Long hair indicates a long life. A dream with short black hair shows respect for the wife. For her husband. Interpretation of a dream about short hair by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi confirmed that short hair in a dream indicates unpleasant events that the dreamer is going through. A man who sees short hair in a dream shows the wealth and money he obtains. Cutting the ends of the hair is often a sign of success at work. A woman’s dream is that she She uncovered her hair, this indicates the absence of her husband from her. What is the interpretation of a dream about hair by Ibn Shaheen? Short hair in a dream indicates unpleasant events that the dreamer is going through. If a woman sees in a dream that her hair is short and begins to grow, this indicates longevity. Hair indicates Short hair indicates distress, anxiety, or exposure to unpleasant events. Long hair is a sign of worry and distress, but if a woman sees it, it is an adornment for her and one of the praiseworthy visions for her. See cutting hair and the length of the days of Hajj are evidence of repentance from sins and righteousness in religion. Cutting long hair in the holy months is a sign of Pay off debts and eliminate anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about short hair for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried girl with short hair shows her inability to achieve what she wants. Hair indicates close to the misfortune that this girl is exposed to. If an unmarried girl sees that her hair is turning grey, this means That she will meet a young man who suits her well. Interpretations of good short hair are an indication of the girl’s marriage in the near future. If a girl dreams that she is losing her hair and going bald, this indicates that she will lose her dependents. Interpretation of a dream about short hair for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is cutting her hair, this indicates The distress that she is exposed to. If she sees her hair short and does not want it to look like it, this indicates wealth and earning a lot of money. A married woman’s dream of cutting her hair indicates that she will face many problems with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about short hair for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who dreams of cutting her hair, This indicates the birth of a female. If you cut a large amount of hair, it means that you will have a baby boy. Hair, in general, long or short, indicates an easy birth full of goodness. Plucking your hair indicates paying off your debts and getting a lot of food after Birth.Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream. If you see someone in a dream that he is plucking his long hair, this means that he will hear unpleasant news and fall into sad events. Long hair in a dream suggests dreams as much as the viewer gets. If one sees long hair in a dream, this indicates sins. The many things that one is exposed to. Seeing long hair separated from each other means that you will lose a lot of money. If the hair is long and soft, this indicates an increase in money from lawful livelihood. Dreaming of long hair for a woman is a good vision and worthy of praise. If a young man sees

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about ducks and chicks from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing ducks and chicks in a dream: Seeing ducks and chicks is one of the many visions that express this, and this vision has many interpretations that differ based on many considerations, including that the ducks and chicks may be small or old, and the ducks and chicks may be dead or slaughtered, and the person may be seen as It hunts chicks or ducks. What concerns us in this article is to review all the indications and special cases of a dream about ducks and chicks. Learn about the interpretation of a dream about ducks and chicks from Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams about ducks and chicks. Seeing ducks and chicks indicates abundance of money, abundance of blessings and good things, the blessing of diet, changing circumstances and changes in personality. This vision also indicates beauty, splendor, great spoils, and participation in projects that bring many benefits to their owner and the achievement of many desired goals. Jurists see either ducks or chicks, both of which are interpreted by women, and some consider that chicks indicate a foolish woman whose opinion has no weight and is not considered in Difficult matters. If a person sees that he is carrying ducks or chicks, this indicates that he has assumed responsibilities, that the tasks are assigned to him, and that they are completed on time without delay or delay. If the dreamer sees a lot of ducks and chicks in his house, this portends a misfortune or an accident. Tragic, and his entry into a whirlpool of problems that requires a person to be patient, think carefully, and persevere. Interpretation of a dream about ducks and chicks by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of the vision of ducks and chicks, that this vision shows a beautiful woman with praiseworthy qualities and can be characterized by intelligence and beauty on the one hand, and lack of mind and vision on the other. Other. Seeing birds in general expresses high status, prestige, high status, high positions, and enjoyment of experiences and powers that help the owner achieve the goals and objectives he wants. On the other hand, seeing ducks expresses strong men who are inclined to religion, jurisprudence, asceticism in this world, interest in science and acquiring knowledge. And submitting to experiences that bring benefit and benefit. If a person sees that he is hunting ducks or chicks, this indicates reaping fruits, achieving goals and objectives, legitimate profit and blessing in the halal diet. If the fortuneteller sees that he is eating from his own meat, this is a sign of great benefit, and a change in the situation. To the best, reap the desired, and enjoy the joys of life. If the ducks or chicks are of the wild type, this indicates a long or permanent journey and the search for a source of livelihood and obtaining money from foreign parties. Interpretation of dreams of ducks and chicks for single women. Seeing ducks and chicks in a dream symbolizes Her companions, the companionship she obtains, and the tips and advice she uses in managing her life. If an unmarried woman sees a chick and a duck, this indicates the benefits and blessings she enjoys, blessed livelihood, walking on the right path, and following good directions without distortion or deviation from the established path. As for If she sees in her dream slaughtering ducks or...

title: Interpretation of seeing Muzdalifah in a dream and interpretation of Hajj in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Muzdalifah in a dream and interpretation of Hajj in a dream. Many people dream of seeing the Holy Kaaba and performing Hajj rituals when they wake up before sleep, due to the greatness and beauty of this duty. The days that a man passes through the Mosque of Mecca and in front of the House of God, which was built by the righteous prophets hundreds of years ago, and the rituals of Hajj and visiting places of Hajj are considered among the most beautiful dreams that promise an abundance of goodness. In the biography of the Messenger in this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing Muzdalifah in a dream and the interpretation of Hajj in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Muzdalifah in a dream Ibn Sirin also explained the dreamer’s vision of Hajj in a dream about a pregnant woman. Ibn Sirin dealt with the interpretation of the dreamer seeing a pilgrimage to a dead person in a dream. He also explained the dreamer’s vision of Hajj at a time other than his usual time, and the interpretation of seeing a dream of returning from Hajj. Ibn Shirin also explained the interpretation of the dreamer’s vision of Muzdalifah in a dream. • When the dreamer sees that he is performing the Hajj obligation in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be blessed. With Salah al-Din, and that God Almighty guides him to Salah al-Din, his reward, and security. Also, when the dreamer sees himself performing the Hajj obligation at the time of Hajj in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will obtain security in the event of travel and receive guardianship in the event of separation. When the dreamer sees himself performing the Hajj obligation at the time of Hajj in a dream, it may indicate This indicates that the dreamer will pay off his debt if he is in debt, or that he will recover from his illness if he is in debt. Bad, and may indicate that the trader will make a profit. Also, when the dreamer sees that he has gone for Hajj or Umrah in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will prolong his life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Hajj in a dream for a single girl When the dreamer sees an unmarried girl going for Hajj in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer He will get married soon, and when he sees the black stone, he will marry a rich husband. . As for the dreamer’s dream of climbing Mount Arafat in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will get to know the man who will marry her in the future. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a dreamer performing Hajj in a dream for a married woman: When the dreamer, who is a married woman, sees herself going for Hajj and performing the Hajj rituals in In a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will have the right to marry her and her children, and if they are unlike the husband, he will be removed. But when the dreamer sees that he is going for Hajj in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will become pregnant if she is expecting children or wants to have children. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Hajj in a dream for a pregnant woman When a dreamer sees that he is going for Hajj in a dream, this may indicate that The dreamer will give birth to a male child. But when the dreamer sees himself kissing the Black Stone while performing Hajj in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will succeed in giving birth to a child who will have a high status and status among scholars. And the jurists.Interpretation of a dream about performing the Hajj obligation in a dream. When the dreamer sees a dead person performing the Hajj obligation in a dream, this may mean that the dead person is dead.

title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing the Sultan in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the Sultan in a dream? It indicates that God is close to the person who sees this dream. The interpretation of the dream of talking to the Sultan in a dream? It indicates the dissolution of anxiety and freedom from worries. What is the interpretation of a man seeing in a dream that he has become a Sultan? It shows his condition The goodness and power that he enjoys. The meaning of seeing the Sultan with an ugly face? Evidence of the wrath of Almighty God upon this dreamer. What is the interpretation of seeing the Sultan in a married woman’s dream? Evidence of the good that she will obtain. Interpretation of the Sultan’s dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the Sultan in a dream often indicates That God is close to the person who sees this dream. Then seeing the Sultan speaking in a dream and being happy with it, this means relief from anxiety and relief from worries. If a person sees the Sultan in a dream and gets angry, this indicates that the dreamer is far from God Almighty. Then seeing the Sultan with a face Frowning in a dream and not knowing the reason for that frowning face. This indicates that the dreamer is corrupt. A man’s dream of a Sultan: Seeing a man in a dream of a Sultan with a happy face, this indicates the goodness that the dreamer will receive. So, seeing the Sultan laughing in a dream about a man is evidence of the high status and high status of that person who sees it. If If one sees in a dream that he has become a sultan, this indicates his good position and the power he enjoys. Next, if a man sees in a dream that he has become a sultan, but in reality he is unable and capable of this position, then this is an indication of his death in the near future. If he dreams If a person kills a sultan, this is an indication that he will get some of the things he is looking for. After that, if a young man dreams that the sultan intends to sit at the dining table, this indicates honor and morals. Seeing the young sultan see and laugh, this indicates a lot of goodness that He will prevail in his life. Then, seeing the Sultan with an ugly face is evidence that God Almighty is angry with this dreamer. Interpretation of the Sultan’s dream for the single woman: If a girl sees in a dream that she is receiving roses from the Sultan, this is a sign of marriage to a man of high status. If she sees in a dream that she is bowing Her head belongs to the Sultan, then this is an indication of some problems in her life. If she sees in a dream that the authorities are crowning her, this is a sign of the high status and status that she will be in. A dream of a Sultan is for a married woman. A Sultan in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the good that she will obtain. Then seeing a Sultan in a woman’s dream Married may refer to the father. Interpretation of a dream about the Sultan for a pregnant woman: Seeing the Sultan laughing in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the nourishment and goodness that she will receive. So seeing a dead Sultan in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that you are hearing happy news.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a key according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Basic dream interpretations: The interpretation of the dream about the key included many interpretations mentioned by many interpretation scholars, and it has different good connotations for the Lord. Interpretation of the dream about the key: Seeing the key in a dream is considered one of the symbols that indicate ample livelihood, ease of circumstances, and various things and their soil for the best by the command of God. Seeing many keys in a dream symbolizes that a person saw in his dream that he is able to achieve his ambitions and also that God will grant him success in his life. If someone sees a big key in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer will have many good things that make him feel With happiness. Many interpretation scholars also mentioned that seeing a key in a dream means abundant sustenance and many good things that will come to the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a key according to Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a key in a dream indicates many things that depend on the material it is made of, its shape, and so on. Of the matters. If a person sees a wooden key in a dream, it is a sign that he will be exposed to hatred and hypocrisy from those close to him, and God knows best. Also, this dream indicates that the dreamer will face many problems and material losses in his life, and God knows best. When the dreamer searches for a long time for a key in... The dream and then discovers it, this is an indication that the dreamer can reach the dreams he wants, but after he makes an effort and works constantly, God will honor him with whatever He wants. If you dream of opening a door with a key, this indicates a set of happy things that will be your lot in life. If an unmarried young man sees these visions, this is a sign that the dreamer will soon marry a beautiful girl. Seeing a key in his hand during a dream means fulfilling a desire. A difficult dream that the dreamer has been waiting for for a long time. If the dreamer sees the key to the Holy Kaaba in a dream, this is good news for living, pleasure and countless benefits that will soon come to the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about the key for individuals: The key in a single woman’s dream indicates big dreams and a promising mind that the dreamer has, Which creates a separate future for her by God’s command. If the dreamer sees in a dream a key but it is unusable, this means that she will marry a young man of bad character, and God knows best. When the dreamer finds many keys in a dream, this means that he will soon marry a distinguished young man who will present to her The world on a silver platter. When a girl sees a key made of iron in a dream, this is a sign that she will soon marry a man who has authority and will help her in life. If the dreamer finds a golden key in his hand, this means that he will soon marry a rich young man who has a lot of money And live a good life. Opening a door with a key in a dream symbolizes that a single woman will be able to achieve the desires she wants in her life and will have a lot to live for. When an unmarried woman in a dream gives someone a key in a dream, this is a sign that she has good qualities. She is good and has many morals

title: Interpretation of a dream about sifting flour in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about sifting flour in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about sifting flour in a dream. It is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of this dream and whether it is a sign of good or bad. It is well explained and it is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream of sifting flour in a dream may indicate Seeing sifted flour in a dream indicates the abundance of money that the dreamer may gain in his life during this time, thanks to God. In the event that one sees sifted flour in a dream, this may indicate wrong words received by the dreamer and his family and he must ask God for help. A fine sieve in a dream may indicate the loss of money in a bad market during this time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about a tower in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a tower in a dream for a single womanThere are many interpretations and indications of seeing a tower in a dream for a single girl, depending on the situation in which she lives and according to the vision of translators and religious scholars. You may also be interested in knowing more about worms in a dream. In our next article, we will learn some interpretations of seeing a tower in a dream for single women and some other cases. Read more: Toilet in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a tower in a dream for a single womanInterpretation of seeing a tower in a dream for a single womanSeeing 500 riyals in a dreamThere are many interpretations of seeing a tower in a single girl's dream, as the interpretation of this vision depends on the situation the girl is going through, and among the most important interpretations of this dream are the following:A girl seeing a tower is a good thing and a sign of approaching joy. If she sees that she is in a tower climbing the top alone, this means that the girl will soon get a good share of money. Seeing a tall, old tower indicates marriage to a young man who suffers from financial difficulties or a poor man, and the girl may later suffer from several disputes after her marriage, so it is necessary to think before making any fateful decision. If a girl sees that she is building a concrete tower, this indicates that she is trying to achieve her dreams and that she wants to change her personal life for the better, forgetting about crises The past. Read more: Pregnancy in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a tower in a dream for married peopleInterpretations of dreams differ from a married woman to a single woman, and we will then explain the interpretation of seeing a tower in a dream for a married woman:Seeing a married woman descending from a tower may indicate the separation of the wife from her husband due to family disputes, and God alone knows best. If a married woman sees herself standing in front of a tall tower and contemplating it, this symbolizes that her life will change radically for the better and that this contemplation is the transition from the past to the present future. Seeing a married woman in one of the signs means that she will achieve her dreams in the near future. As for the married woman who sees the tower in her tower in her dream, this means that she will face many difficulties, problems and marital disputes. Read more: Penguin in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a tower in a dream by Ibn SirinThere are many interpretations of seeing a tower in a dream by the great Sheikh Ibn Sirin, and we will study a group of these interpretations in the following points:Whoever sees that there is a group of tall towers collapsing before his eyes, this indicates that this person commits many mistakes and sins in his life, and we ask God Almighty for success. If a person sees in a dream that there is A tower in the city collapses or falls, this is a sign of unrest and ongoing injustice that will lead to the outbreak of war in the city in which the dreamer resides. Seeing the fall of a building or a tall tower indicates failure, failure in studies, and the loss of a lot of money. Whoever dreams that he finds it difficult to climb the tower to the top, this indicates the presence of difficulties in this person's life. We ask God Almighty to relieve distress and calm everyone's worries. The descent of the tower in a dream indicates the emergence of many situations

title: What is the interpretation of seeing oranges for unmarried women?

preview.html: The color orange in a dream is a symbol of health, satisfaction of desires, and marriage, and the dreamed orange carries some good interpretations in the dream of married and married women and in the dream in general... Here is an article about the interpretation of the vision of orange for the poor and married woman. What is the interpretation of seeing oranges for the single woman? If a woman dreams With a pot of a large orange on a tree and she could not reach it, it means that she does not trust men and may remain alone for a long time. To dream of an orange in the hand of a loved one or a loved one is a sign of a happy meeting. If a public girl planning her wedding sees an orange in In a dream, this means that her married life will be happy. If an ordinary girl tries to pick fruit from the top of the tree in her dream, this indicates that it is difficult for her to choose a partner and that she is not in a hurry to get married. If a woman dreams that she is peeling an orange and does not eat it, then this It means that she will reveal her feelings to someone with whom she carries many feelings and emotions. If a woman sees in her dream that someone gives her an orange, this indicates affection and love. What is the interpretation of seeing oranges for a single woman? Seeing oranges in a public woman’s dream is evidence that she is searching for a way Happiness. For an ordinary woman who sees herself eating oranges in a dream, this means the end of her fears and fatigue and the psychological comfort she will feel. Seeing oranges in a dream for a married woman at an inappropriate time indicates that there are many quarrels taking place between her and her husband secretly. If a woman sees If a married woman buys oranges from the market in her dream, she will likely separate from her partner, and the more oranges she buys, the longer the period of separation. If the husband sees in his dream that his wife gives him an orange, this symbolizes the relationship of love and affection that prevails between them in reality. Interpretation Seeing oranges in a dreamIf you dream of having an orange in his hands, it means that you will meet a person who will play an important role in your life. The dream of buying oranges from the market symbolizes the fulfillment of an important desire in the dreamer’s life. If you see many orange trees with bright orange fruits, it means that Your relationship will lead to a strong and happy marriage. Dreaming about how you eat an orange symbolizes that the dreamer is dissatisfied with his personal life. If you peel an orange in your dream, it means that you will have a romantic date. Seeing an already peeled orange means feeling anxious due to the illness of a relative. If you see A fruitful orange tree, then you do not have to worry about anything, this dream portends good health. In a dream you eat an orange and feel its sour taste, this means that you may encounter problems. If the smell of oranges is delicious and sweet, then problems will pass to you again. The dream in which you buy portends Oranges from the market signify family problems, health deterioration, and professional turmoil. If you see the peel of an orange, tangerine, or watermelon in your dream, it means that you will receive a great reward or a pleasant surprise, but if you eat the peel, this is a sign of unexpected happiness. The meaning of seeing the peel

title: The 8 most important interpretations of seeing breast milk in a dream

preview.html: What does it mean for a single woman to have milk coming out of her breast? Accomplishing things that you kept impossible to happen. What is the purpose of seeing spoiled breast milk? It portends death and anguish. What does it mean for milk to come out of a man’s breast? It indicates the high position he occupies in his work. The meaning of the return of milk The breast into a cavity in a dream? Expresses exposure to many problems and fears. Interpretation of milk coming out of the breast of a married woman. Milk coming out of the breast in a married woman’s dream for a while, indicates that her anxiety about her new life has ended and she will adapt quickly. The vision predicts that the woman will soon have children. The milk comes From one breast, it indicates understanding with the husband and then living in an atmosphere of love and friendship that connects them. Then the vision symbolizes the passion that unites them and one cannot separate them. The milk that comes out of the right breast in a dream indicates the fulfillment of a long-awaited desire. Seeing milk It comes out of the left breast only, indicating the birth of a beautiful, healthy baby girl. The vision foretells the recovery of a woman from an illness she suffered from for a long time, and God knows best. Breastfeeding a small child in a dream indicates the end of the tense and stressful situation that you are feeling. Interpretation of breast milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin confirms This dream indicates halal food. It is possible that this dream is that God will give the dreamer a child. There is another bad vision for this dream, which is that the dreamer will face some problems and difficulties in his life. If a woman sees that she is breastfeeding a child, the doors of the world will be closed in her face. Whoever sees a woman pouring milk on a person’s face indicates his imprisonment. Excess breast milk for an unmarried woman. Excessive milk production indicates a new job and then obtaining a great source of livelihood. Seeing milk coming out of the breast is a free girl. In a dream to achieve things that remained impossible to happen. The vision symbolizes great excellence. Whatever the girl achieves in her studies, she will have a great status and will be a source of pride for her family. The vision expresses the girl’s emergence from the state of sadness she is experiencing due to the failure of a romantic relationship. The vision promises the achievement of goals and ambitions in an easy way. Then the vision indicates marriage to a wealthy young man and her social status will rise. Seeing a girl breastfeeding a young child in a dream means getting rid of the burdens and pressures she bears. Seeing a girl foretells the imminent date of her engagement to a good young man. Feeling pain when milk comes out of the breast expresses exposure to problems. Seeing a dream about spoiled breast milk. Bad breast milk in a dream foretells death, distress and anguish. The vision symbolizes The interpretation of seeing milk coming out of a widow’s breast symbolizes seeing milk coming out of the breast in a dream for a single widow to marry a man she knows. Seeing a dream foretells the marriage of one of her children soon and he will have a grandchild after several months of marriage. Interpretation of milk coming out of Breasts in a dream by Imam Al-Amin Seeing breast milk in a dream symbolizes the birth of a good boy. Seeing breast milk heralds goodness and abundance. If an unmarried young man sees breast milk in a dream, this indicates marriage.

title: Interpretation of a dream about sleeping in bed with someone I know

preview.html: But in our topic today from gptafser.com/ we will explain the interpretations of the dream according to each character. Continue with us, dear reader, until the end of the topic to benefit from our information. Interpretation of a dream about sleeping in bed with someone I know in a dream about a single girl. Seeing a girl in her dream sleeping with someone she knows in reality. Bed. The dream indicates that this person is dishonest and that the girl is losing her trust in him. Or perhaps the man whom the only girl saw in her dream sharing her bed is completely dishonest. Perhaps seeing a girl in her dream indicates that this person is sleeping in a bed and he is in the same bed with him. It indicates the girl's intense love for this person in reality and thinks about him a lot. Which led to her seeing her sleeping with him in bed in her sleep. In the event that an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is approaching someone she knows in her bed. The vision shows that there is an unusual place for this person in the heart The girl and controls her thinking. It also indicates the existence of a strong relationship between the two and the truth that leads to sharing life with reality. If an unmarried girl sees that she is sleeping next to a person who is forbidden to her in a dream. Evidence that this girl will soon escape from some of the misfortunes that she will face in her life. The same dream shows an unmarried girl, but according to the interpretation of the Nabulsi scholar, there is certainty towards this man. And the person whom that girl saw in her bed shares the bed with her. She will keep it and it will be her support in the world after God to overcome the problems that she will face in her next life. Seeing a married woman in her dream that she is sleeping with someone in bed and this is forbidden for her. Conclusive evidence that this married woman has feelings for this person. These feelings may indicate mutual love or From one side, her idea of ​​marrying him may be. If he sees her sleeping with her husband and sharing a bed with her in her sleep. The dream shows the presence of happiness that overwhelms the couple. It is also evidence that husbands live a life of love and affection for everyone they desire. When a married woman sees In her dream, she is sleeping next to her husband in bed and is showing signs of sadness. The dream indicates that the married woman does not love her husband and does not want to continue her life with him. Because her life is full of troubles and troubles. Seeing a married woman sleeping in bed with her father or brother in her dream. This is The place where the signs of love and attention that a married woman gives appear. Seeing a married woman in her dream sleeping in a bed with someone she does not know. The dream shows the failure of her life, marriage, as a result of her lack of true love for her husband. The vision indicates the existence of intense love and strong friendship linking the dreamer to this character he knows. Perhaps the vision indicates the existence of a project that brings together both the dreamer and the person in the dream, which results in a partnership relationship in the success and excellence of the new project.
